description: Compatible with all models of 4" to 6" viewing size GPS. This mount has a lot of unique features not found in other mounts. First, the HIPPO Spring Lock holder offers a custom fit that locks down your device (No need to purchase Cradle to fit your GPS), The NonSlip Jello Block on the base of the mount will stick on to your dashboard and secure the mount on to your dash. Compatible All GPS 3.5" 4.3" 4.7" 5" 6" GPS *ChargerCity Direct Replacement Warranty*
title: ChargerCity® Hippo Series Universal Smartphone NonSlip Beanbag Friction Mount for Garmin Nuvi TomTom Via GO Start Live XXL XL Magellan Roadmate GPS *Fit all 3.5" 4.3" 5" 7" GPS* (Includes ChargerCity Direct Replacement Warranty)
